name: Adventure Isles
description:
Arya woke up on a strange island and faced the unknown jungle and sea. She met Kyle, a teenager with Vizor, and so Arya began her exploration and survival in the company of her friends, but it seems that there are too many secrets on this island… flickering girl, glimmering portals, huge slabs of stone engraved with mysterious symbols...

Adventure Isles is a family adventure and farming simulation game. Explore the island and unlock its secrets, manage your big farm and upgrade the buildings. Work together with your friends and start a new adventures!


- Farming on this little island, harvest crops, take care of animals.
- Build kinds of workshops to process the products you harvested, meet the daily needs of the islanders.
- Uncover the island's secrets and complete mysterious quests.
- Adventure with your buddies. Take a look at the landscape of this island and search for rich treasures.
- Explore more maps and travel to every corner of Adventure Isles!

Contact: support@sphinxjoy.com
